mapper.select: update INSBChannelcarinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},drivingarea = #{drivingarea},carlicenseno = #{carlicenseno},customername = #{customername},address = #{address},phonenumber = #{phonenumber},vehiclebrand = #{vehiclebrand},vehicletype = #{vehicletype},registdate = #{registdate},engineno = #{engineno},chassiso = #{chassiso},batchcode = #{batchcode},channelcode = {channelcode} where id = #{id}
